recipe.title: Summery Confetti Salad
ingredients: 1 package (16 ounces) frozen lima beans, thawed
2 cups green beans, blanched and cut into 1-inch pieces*
instructions: In a bowl, toss together corn, lima beans, green beans, tomatoes, onion, avocado, jalapeño and basil. In a second bowl, whisk together oil, vinegar, honey, salt and pepper. Add vinaigrette to salad and toss to coat. Refrigerate for an hour before serving to let it marinate, if you can stand to wait.
